isEnabled.description: Enables auth (note: this has no effect in production environments)

tokenSecret.description: A secret used to encode/decode Json Web Tokens

tokenLifespan.description: How long a token should remain valid for

tokenIssuer.description: The identity of the issuer of the token

logMissingPermissions.description: In enabled, a warning is logged on app start for any routes with missing permissions (note: any routes without defined permissions are inaccessible)
